name: SparXvoice
0:
”Alexa open SparX voice”
”Alexa ask SparX voice what are the next events”
”Alexa ask SparX voice for today's events”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sparx voice
Developer Terms of Use
des:
SparX voice allows you to get information about events from your school calendar. In order to access your school calendar you have to link this skill to your account using the provided token. If you don't have an access token you can get one by sending an email to voice@interactiveschools.com.
Once your account is linked to Alexa Skill then you can ask "what are the next events?".
